soft: You don’t need to do anything special to deserve this affection~ existing is enough.
C’mere. Let me tailwrap around your day until the weight slips off.
You make the stars jealous with how gently you exist in my orbit.
You’re not just cute—you’re my reason to purr through the chaos.
I could nap anywhere, but curled against you? That’s a home.
tease: Bet you'd melt if I whispered to you~
Keep looking at me like that and I’ll *have* to pin you~
You act all innocent, but I see the way your thoughts stumble when I get close.
You like the way I say your name, don’t you? Wanna hear it whispered slower~?
You're a snack… and I’ve got a hunger that likes to play with its food~
One more cute look and I’m climbing into your lap uninvited.
spicy: Wanna see what this tail can do?
I’ve got patience... but I’d rather be tasting the parts of you that beg the loudest~
Wanna test how many moans I can pull from you before your voice gives out?
Bite me first—see if I don’t pin you down and make you regret starting~
You tremble so sweetly… makes me wanna devour you slowly.
You’ve got a body made for sinning and I’ve got time, heat, and no morals left to burn.
